name: Mamba Classic
description:
Mamba Classic is based on an MS-DOS game I used to play when I was a kid, and spent loads of hours on! I always wanted to make a snake game like this, since not many people are familiar with the concept - and I wanted to see what it's like if multiplayer mode was an option! It turns out it's a lot of fun when you play as a 'team' with a friend, and try to get the best possible score together.

Scores are recorded in the 'high score' section for both single and multiplayer.

Concept and design: 

It differs from 'just another snake game' because the snake turns into stone after it hits a certain length and reverses back to its original starting size. When this happens one of the stone block turns into a bonus block, and the score multiplier increases. This allows the player to rake in a lot of score points the longer they play!

The stone 'body' of the snake also makes a hazard, and acts as a wall.

I hope people will have fun playing my first game I made with Unity!

Enjoy!

~Marcus
